Package com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF

Class Payment

java.lang.Object
com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.dbjson.Serializable
com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.Invoice
com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.Payment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Serializable>
public class Payment extends Invoice
The Payment class is used to store information about payments made by users. It extends the Invoice class and includes details such as the bus ID, departure date, and booked seats.

Instances of this class can be created using either buyer and renter IDs or instances of the Account and Renter classes, respectively.

It also provides methods for getting bus information, departure details, and making seat bookings.

Additional methods are available to check seat availability and find available schedules.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Raihan Muhammad Ihsan

      Parameters:
